    • Uses of Users in projectWebShop.controller

      Methods in projectWebShop.controller that return Users 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Users ShopFacade.login(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Searches the Users table in the database database for a user corresponing to the specified username on log in.
      Users ShopFacade.register(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Registers a new user in the system by creating a new entity and saving it in the Users table in the database.
      Methods in projectWebShop.controller that return types with arguments of type Users 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Users> ShopFacade.showUsers()
      Collects all rows from the Users table in the database in a list.
